attributes.action: Halt the planned conversion to low enrgy lamps
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Low energy lamps (mostly flourescents) give thousands of people bad headaches.
A rethink is required before replacing incandescents. Perhaps waiting for LED technology to catch up for instance.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
